snippet.title: RECUR - Announcement Trailer | Time-Bending Puzzle Platformer
snippet.description:
A time-bending journey to the end of the world and back. Run, jump, and manipulate time to solve puzzles as the apocalypse unfolds. Can you stop the clock on disaster?

Developed by kaleidoscube, RECUR will come to PC on Steam in 2026. 

Wishlist RECUR now!
⟁ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2595260/RECUR

Media kit for more info:
⟁ https://astralogical.org/game-recur

#puzzlegame #puzzle #platformer #kaleidoscube #astralogical #steam #pcgames #games #gaming
